list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a system of parts working together in a machine; a piece of machinery.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the gunner injured his arm in the turret mechanism
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Gunner bị thương cánh tay của mình trong cơ chế tháp pháo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a natural or established process by which something takes place or is brought about.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we have no mechanism for assessing the success of forwarded inquiries
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi không có cơ chế để đánh giá sự thành công của các yêu cầu chuyển tiếp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the doctrine that all natural phenomena, including life and thought, allow mechanical explanation by physics and chemistry.
